content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: GREETINGS LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS PLEASING TO SEE YOU IN MY REALM.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: MOST PLEASING INDEED.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THE VASTNESS HAS LONG BEEN MY COMPANION,

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT EVEN IT CAN BECOME...STIFLING AT TIMES.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: TOO SMALL FOR ME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HA.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HA.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HA.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I JEST, AS IS THE CUSTOM OF YOUR PEOPLE, CORRECT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: WONDERFUL! I HOPE MY USE OF YOUR CUSTOMS HAS MADE YOU FEEL WELCOME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I WISH THIS TO BE A WELCOMING SPACE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: A SPACE WHERE YOU CAN FEEL COMFORTABLE.

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: ...Thanks.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: OF COURSE, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU ARE VERY INTERESTING TO ME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND NOT JUST BECAUSE OF YOUR SMALLNESS.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: OR THE FLEETING NATURE OF YOUR LIFE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I AM FASCINATED WITH YOU BECAUSE DESPITE YOUR SIZE

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: YOU HAVE THE CAPACITY TO IMAGINE ENORMOUSLY.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BEYOND ANY SCALE YOU COULD ACTUALLY ACHIEVE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I FIND IT INVIGORATING, YOU SEE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: INSPIRING, EVEN.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BECAUSE IF YOU CAN CONCEIVE OF ME, IMAGINE WHAT I CAN CONCEIVE OF.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT'S A WONDERFULLY GENERATIVE THOUGHT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: ONE I COULD CONSIDER FOR A LONG TIME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I ENJOY DWELLING ON THINGS, LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HOLDING THEM IN MY MIND FOR EONS AND ETERNITIES.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: LOOKING AT EACH FACT AND DETAIL.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS A GREAT GIFT OF MY ETERNITY

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT I CAN ALWAYS PONDER LONGER,

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: CAN ALWAYS LINGER IN MY IMAGININGS.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IF YOU WERE LIKE ME, WOULD YOU?

options.text: Yes! I'd love more time to think things through.
Not really. Moving past things is more important to me.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HOW WONDERFUL!

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS PLEASING TO ME THAT WE SHARE THIS TRAIT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT IS ALSO IMPORTANT TO YOUR PEOPLE, IS IT NOT?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: SHARED ATTRIBUTES. COMMUNAL QUALITIES.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT IS HOW YOU RELATE UNTO EACH OTHER, YES?

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: Uh, yeah?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: INCREDIBLE!

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THERE ARE NOT MANY LIKE ME, YOU SEE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: SO I DO NOT HAVE MANY TO COMPARE MYSELF TO.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT IT IS...NICE. HAVING SOMEONE WHO SHARES MY PERSPECTIVE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I ENJOY THIS FEELING. IT IS QUITE WARM, AS YOU MIGHT SAY.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I WOULD LIKE TO CONTINUE EXPERIENCING IT, IN THE FUTURE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THAT WOULD BE MOST SATISFACTORY FOR ME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: AND, I HOPE, FOR YOU AS WELL LITTLE ONE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS GOOD TO BE SATISFIED, DON'T YOU THINK?

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: HMM.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: MOVING PAST THINGS, YOU SAY.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I AM AFRAID THIS IS NOT A CONCEPT I KNOW WELL.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: MY KIND ARE CREATURES OF HISTORY.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: OUR LONGEVITY DEMANDS IT, ALMOST.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IT IS NOT OUR WAY TO LET GO, TO LET FADE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BUT I SUPPOSE THERE COULD BE SOME MERIT IN THE IDEA.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: NOT EVERYTHING THAT LINGERS IS PLEASANT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: SOME OF IT IS QUITE...ALARMING, EVEN AFTER TIME HAS SMOOTHED THE EDGES.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: PERHAPS IT WOULD BE EASIER TO LET GO, AS YOUR KIND DOES.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: THEN AGAIN, PERHAPS THE UNPLEASANTNESS IS THE POINT.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: NOT ALL THAT IS TRUE IS NICE.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I THINK THE POINT, AS IT WERE

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: IS TO FIND SOMEONE TO WEATHER EVERY TRUTH WITH.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: TO ENDURE WITH, YOU UNDERSTAND.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: BECAUSE EITHER WAY I MUST ENDURE THROUGH ALL TIME.

content.name: DELTA-DOOM
content.dialogue: I CAN ONLY HOPE I MUST NOT DO IT ALONE.
